description.value:
You are always ready to adapt your equipment to the needs of the hunt. Interacting to change the configuration of a combination or modular weapon or to change your grip on a two-hand weapon gains the relentless trait for you.

Special If you have a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.Nl1Aqj6JTdMv0qbB]{Bloodseeking Blade} signature tool with the combination, modular, or two-hand trait, you can choose different options for each configuration for slayer class features or feats that require you to make a choice when you Reinforce your Arsenal. For example, you can choose different damage types for bloodseeking blade's initial benefit for each of your weapon's configurations.
